body:
The Minecraft website I grew up with was the one with a dirt background but now they decided to change it and it just looks really bad :(. Here it is for yourself:

https://minecraft.net/en/

That website was such a classic with the dirt background and they decided to get rid of it. For those who didn't know what the old website it looked like this:

https://www.google.co.uk/search?q=minecraft+website&client=firefox-b-ab&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ve...

It was so easy to change your skin on that site ^ :(

title: Minecraft Website Changed :(

replies.body: I think it looks pretty cool.  Gives it the "next gen" look
replies.body_tagged: I think it looks pretty cool.  Gives it the "next gen" look

replies.body:
It looks like a bootleg Minecraft website that is 3 seconds away from a DMCA. Pretty sure the header image has jpeg artifacts and the hamburger menu is disgusting. The new shop merchandise is also atrocious. The bootleg looking site even has bootleg looking items.

https://www.jinx.com/p/minecraft_periodic_table_of_resources.html

replies.body:
i miss the old design i prefer old and nostalgic compared to new and futuristic
btw is it just me or does minecraft cost a lot more like i remember getting MC when it was $20 now its $35

replies.body: Many people don't like change, especially on a large scale with something that's been the same for a very long time. I found the old one was starting to look cheap, out of date and unwelcoming, on the other hand this new website is on the modern side of design and looks very professional. Microsoft most likely wanted a redesign as they are now the owners of Mojang.
replies.body_tagged: Many people don't like change, especially on a large scale with something that's been the same for a very long time. I found the old one was starting to look cheap, out of date and unwelcoming, on the other hand this new website is on the modern side of design and looks very professional. Microsoft most likely wanted a redesign as they are now the owners of Mojang.

replies.body: I am all for the new website, the old one - as Aura stated above - was outdated and not really pleasing. The new one certainly portrays an image of a company who knows what they are doing.
replies.body_tagged: I am all for the new website, the old one - as Aura stated above - was outdated and not really pleasing. The new one certainly portrays an image of a company who knows what they are doing.

replies.body: Minecraft accounts also have appeared to go up in price, it was around 30 NZD, now it's 40 NZD.
replies.body_tagged: Minecraft accounts also have appeared to go up in price, it was around 30 NZD, now it's 40 NZD.

replies.body: I agree with Auratixx. The old one wasn't exactly the nicest and it looked outdated. Now it looks modern and more becoming of a billionaire company.
